description.zh-cn: 三国时代曹魏武将及重臣，官至征南大将军领荆州牧，长年负责戍守荆北军区防线。深受曹丕信赖。
description.en: A military general and key official of Cao Wei during the Three Kingdoms period. He served as the Grand General Who Attacks the South and Governor of Jing Province, responsible for defending the northern Jing province military district for many years. He was deeply trusted by Cao Pi.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏的开国皇帝，与夏侯尚自年少时便交好。
description.en: The founding emperor of the state of Cao Wei, and a close friend of Xiahou Shang since their youth.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏名将，夏侯尚的叔父。
description.en: A famous general of Cao Wei and the uncle of Xiahou Shang.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年权臣，曹魏的奠基人，曹丕之父。
description.en: A warlord who rose to great power in the late Eastern Han dynasty and laid the foundation for the state of Cao Wei. He was the father of Cao Pi.

description.zh-cn: 曹操之子，曹魏宗室名将。
description.en: A son of Cao Cao and a renowned imperial general of Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期的政权之一，由曹丕建立。
description.en: One of the three major states that competed for supremacy over China in the Three Kingdoms period, founded by Cao Pi.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉的开国皇帝，曹魏的敌对势力领袖。
description.en: The founding emperor of the state of Shu Han, and leader of a rival power to Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期的政权之一，由刘备建立。
description.en: One of the three major states that competed for supremacy over China in the Three Kingdoms period, founded by Liu Bei.

description.zh-cn: 汉末三国时期的郡县，位于蜀汉与曹魏边境的战略要地。
description.en: A commandery during the late Han Dynasty and Three Kingdoms period, a strategic location on the border between Shu Han and Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 原属蜀汉的将领，后投降曹魏。
description.en: A military general who originally served Shu Han before defecting to Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 刘备的养子，蜀汉将领，曾任上庸太守。
description.en: The adopted son of Liu Bei and a general of Shu Han, who served as the administrator of Shangyong.

description.zh-cn: 东吴的建立者。
description.en: The founder of the state of Eastern Wu.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期的政权之一，由孙权建立。
description.en: One of the three major states that competed for supremacy over China in the Three Kingdoms period, founded by Sun Quan.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏宗室名将，夏侯尚的姻亲。
description.en: A renowned imperial general of Cao Wei and a relative of Xiahou Shang by marriage.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期荆州的战略重镇。
description.en: A strategic city in Jing Province during the Three Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 东吴将领。
description.en: A military general of Eastern Wu.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏的都城之一。
description.en: One of the capital cities of Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏的谋臣。
description.en: An advisor and official of Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏官员，早年曾鄙视夏侯尚。
description.en: An official of Cao Wei who looked down on Xiahou Shang in his early years.

description.zh-cn: 曹氏宗女，曹真之妹，夏侯尚的正室夫人。
description.en: A noble lady from the Cao clan, sister of Cao Zhen, and the official wife of Xiahou Shang.

description.zh-cn: 夏侯尚的堂弟。
description.en: The cousin of Xiahou Shang.

description.zh-cn: 夏侯尚与德阳乡主之子。
description.en: The son of Xiahou Shang and Princess Deyang.

description.zh-cn: 夏侯尚与德阳乡主之女，司马师的元配夫人。
description.en: The daughter of Xiahou Shang and Princess Deyang, and the first wife of Sima Shi.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏后期的权臣，夏侯徽的丈夫。
description.en: A powerful regent in the late Cao Wei period and the husband of Xiahou Hui.

description.zh-cn: 夏侯尚的女婿。
description.en: The son-in-law of Xiahou Shang.

description.zh-cn: 夏侯尚的侄子。
description.en: The nephew of Xiahou Shang.

description.zh-cn: 夏侯尚的侄孙，后被封为夏侯尚的后嗣。
description.en: The grandnephew of Xiahou Shang, later designated as his heir.

description.zh-cn: 夏侯尚自年少便与曹丕往来友好，才智为其所赏识，深受其信赖。
description.en: Since his youth, Xiahou Shang had a friendly relationship with Cao Pi, whose intelligence was appreciated by the latter, and he was deeply trusted.

description.zh-cn: 夏侯尚曾任曹丕的五官将文学，成为其麾下部属。曹丕称帝后，夏侯尚被委以重任，先后担任征南将军、征南大将军、荆州牧等职。
description.en: Xiahou Shang served as Cao Pi's 'Wuguanjiang Wenxue', becoming his subordinate. After Cao Pi became emperor, Xiahou Shang was entrusted with important responsibilities, successively holding positions such as General Who Attacks the South, Grand General Who Attacks the South, and Governor of Jing Province.

description.zh-cn: 因夏侯尚宠幸爱妾而冷落曹氏出身的正室夫人，曹丕震怒之下派人杀害其爱妾，导致夏侯尚悲伤过度，精神恍惚，并间接导致其日后病重不愈。
description.en: Because Xiahou Shang favored his beloved concubine and neglected his official wife from the Cao clan, Cao Pi was enraged and sent someone to kill the concubine. This caused Xiahou Shang to become overwhelmed with grief and mentally distraught, indirectly contributing to his later inability to recover from a serious illness.

description.zh-cn: 夏侯尚是夏侯渊的侄子。
description.en: Xiahou Shang was the nephew of Xiahou Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 在曹操平定冀州时，夏侯尚以军司马之职随军四处征战。
description.en: When Cao Cao conquered Ji Province, Xiahou Shang served as a Military Sima and campaigned with the army.

description.zh-cn: 夏侯尚曾以参军身份跟随曹彰出兵平定代郡乌桓的叛乱并建功。
description.en: Xiahou Shang once served as an Army Advisor, following Cao Zhang on a campaign to suppress the Wuhuan rebellion in Dai Commandery and achieving merit.

description.zh-cn: 作为曹魏将领，夏侯尚负责荆北防线，与蜀汉对峙，并攻取其领地上庸。
description.en: As a general of Cao Wei, Xiahou Shang was responsible for the northern Jing Province defense line, confronting Shu Han and capturing its territory of Shangyong.

description.zh-cn: 夏侯尚与降将孟达共同领兵击败刘封，攻克蜀汉的上庸。
description.en: Xiahou Shang and the defected general Meng Da jointly led troops to defeat Liu Feng and conquer Shangyong from Shu Han.

description.zh-cn: 与孟达联手击败时任蜀汉上庸太守的刘封，攻克上庸。
description.en: In alliance with Meng Da, he defeated Liu Feng, then the Shu Han administrator of Shangyong, and conquered the commandery.

description.zh-cn: 作为曹魏荆州都督，夏侯尚负责防备并与孙吴军队交战。
description.en: As the Cao Wei commander of Jing Province, Xiahou Shang was responsible for defending against and engaging with the forces of Eastern Wu.

description.zh-cn: 夏侯尚与曹真奉曹丕之命，率军共同围攻东吴的江陵。
description.en: Under Cao Pi's orders, Xiahou Shang and Cao Zhen led an army to jointly besiege Jiangling, which was controlled by Eastern Wu.

description.zh-cn: 在江陵之战中，夏侯尚于夜间使用火攻策略，成功大败东吴将领诸葛瑾的军队。
description.en: During the Battle of Jiangling, Xiahou Shang used a night fire attack strategy to successfully defeat the army of the Eastern Wu general Zhuge Jin.

description.zh-cn: 蒋济认为曹丕对夏侯尚恩宠过度，赐予‘作威作福，杀人活人’之权不妥，并成功劝止了曹丕。
description.en: Jiang Ji believed that Cao Pi's favor towards Xiahou Shang was excessive, and that granting him the power 'to act with arbitrary authority, to kill or to grant life' was inappropriate, and successfully persuaded Cao Pi to rescind it.

description.zh-cn: 杜袭早年即鄙视夏侯尚，称其‘非有益之友’。后来曹丕在夏侯尚为亡妾失态后也认为杜袭的看法有道理。
description.en: Du Xi looked down on Xiahou Shang from early on, calling him 'not a beneficial friend'. Later, after Xiahou Shang's inappropriate behavior over his deceased concubine, Cao Pi came to believe that Du Xi's view had merit.

description.zh-cn: 德阳乡主是夏侯尚的正室夫人。
description.en: Princess Deyang was the official wife of Xiahou Shang.

description.zh-cn: 德阳乡主是曹真的妹妹。
description.en: Princess Deyang was the younger sister of Cao Zhen.

description.zh-cn: 夏侯儒是夏侯尚的堂弟。
description.en: Xiahou Ru was the younger male cousin of Xiahou Shang.

description.zh-cn: 夏侯玄是夏侯尚的儿子。
description.en: Xiahou Xuan was the son of Xiahou Shang.

description.zh-cn: 夏侯玄是德阳乡主的儿子。
description.en: Xiahou Xuan was the son of Princess Deyang.

description.zh-cn: 夏侯徽是夏侯尚的女儿。
description.en: Xiahou Hui was the daughter of Xiahou Shang.

description.zh-cn: 夏侯徽是德阳乡主的女儿。
description.en: Xiahou Hui was the daughter of Princess Deyang.

description.zh-cn: 夏侯徽是夏侯玄的姐妹。
description.en: Xiahou Hui was the sister of Xiahou Xuan.

description.zh-cn: 夏侯徽是司马师的元配夫人。
description.en: Xiahou Hui was the first wife of Sima Shi.

description.zh-cn: 夏侯尚的一个女儿嫁给了和逌，二人为翁婿关系。
description.en: One of Xiahou Shang's daughters married He You, making them father-in-law and son-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 夏侯奉是夏侯尚的侄子。
description.en: Xiahou Feng was the nephew of Xiahou Shang.

description.zh-cn: 夏侯本是夏侯尚的侄孙，后被立为夏侯尚的后嗣以延续其封爵。
description.en: Xiahou Ben was the grandnephew of Xiahou Shang and was later designated as his heir to continue his peerage.
